GSD.description: Unspecified vulnerability in Oracle Java SE 7u40 and earlier, Java SE 6u60 and earlier, JRockit R28.2.8 and earlier, JRockit R27.7.6 and earlier, and Java SE Embedded 7u40 and earlier allows remote attackers to affect availability via unknown vectors related to Security.

description_data.value: Unspecified vulnerability in Oracle Java SE 7u40 and earlier, Java SE 6u60 and earlier, JRockit R28.2.8 and earlier, JRockit R27.7.6 and earlier, and Java SE Embedded 7u40 and earlier allows remote attackers to affect availability via unknown vectors related to Security.

advisories.affected_versions: All versions starting from 1.4-alpha0 up to 1.4.7, all versions starting from 1.5-alpha0 up to 1.5.2
advisories.description: This package allows remote attackers to affect availability via unknown vectors related to Security.
advisories.title: UnsyncByteArrayOutputStream Denial of Service
